name: The Alchemist (itch) (Evix)
description:
Alfons lives deep in the forest. Many fortnights have passed since he last left his abode and is in dire need of medicinal herbs for his craft. Help him gather 5 unique herbs scattered throughout the land - but be careful, Alfons is deathly allergic to butterflies! Cast gusts of wind to push these colorful creatures out of harm's way.

Controls:

'A' and 'D' - move left and right

'Spacebar' - jump

'S' - cast wind gust

'E' - pick up items

Note: The Alchemist is a silent experience.

Developed by Steven Whitfield

Art by Steven Whitfield and A.T. Ashmore

Special thanks to kingcoyote85 from Game Dev League Discord for the initial idea
